name: Xorn
damage_resistances: acid; damage from nonmagical, non-adamantine weapons
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 16

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The xorn makes three claw attacks and then makes a bite attack if it can.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature that was hit by the xorns claws at least twice this turn. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage  and the xorn consumes one of the following nonmagical objects in the targets possession: a worn set of metal armor or a carried metal weapon or shield  a piece of metal equipment  a gem  or up to 1 000 coins. For 1 minute after an item is consumed  a creature can retrieve it from the gullet of a willing  incapacitated  or dead xorn  taking 7 (2d6) acid damage in the process.

special_abilities.name: Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The xorn has advantage on Stealth checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

special_abilities.name: Treasure Sense
special_abilities.desc: The xorn can locate by smell coins and gems within 500 feet.
